name: Homework Club - Afterschool Program
description: The program meets Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday: 2:00 – 6:00 pm and Wednesday: 12:30 – 6:00 pm Homework Club schedule follows the SFUSD Calendar and includes: 1.Daily literacy and STEAM education, activities that reinforce school learning, and additional support with homework and classes 2.After homework, children engage in a variety of activities including outdoor recreation, cooking classes, art projects, gardening, and more Teachers meet children at E.R. howToGetIt: Go to: https://fccenters.org/hwclub/ or call 415.715.6746. Families are welcome to enroll their children or enquire about the waitlist throughout the year
address: 2565 San Bruno Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94134
